archimate:Product.name: Apache Spark MLib
archimate:Product.documentation: https://spark.apache.org/mllib/ MLlib is Apache Spark's scalable machine learning library. MLlib fits into Spark's APIs and interoperates with NumPy in Python (as of Spark 0.9) and R libraries (as of Spark 1.5). You can use any Hadoop data source (e.g. HDFS, HBase, or local files), making it easy to plug into Hadoop workflows.
